reviews.title: a lovely hotel in a very lovely village
reviews.text: If you're headed to Garabandal, you probably know about the apparitions there in the 1960s. It's not a place people go to otherwise, as it is well off the well-beaten tourist trail. But it is a special place-- beautiful scenery and wildlife; deeply spiritual. And it wasn't as inaccesible (by rental car from Bilbao) as we thought it would be. The Hosteria Garabandal, where we stayed, is a lovely place-- basic accomodations, nothing fancy-- but nothing is lacking, either. The rooms are spotless and very spacious, with fully-equipped bathrooms with shower. The staff (especially the woman who runs the place) is very friendly and helpful. Meals are fresh and delicious home cooking. Our stay here was a highlight of our recent European trip.
